TopicTitle: Can't place radial air intakes, sph and vab lag with regular air intakes

Articles.Content:
Any type of radial air intake I try to place will not place and it locks the game up, I can't press any buttons or place any parts once it locks up and I have to restart because

The only thing I can do

Is move the camera, does anyone know a fix to this?

edit: also whenever I place a regular air intake it causes extreme lag

edit 2: alright so from what I have gathered it actually has something to do with kspinterstellar, does anyone know a work around?

edit: fixed :/

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-12T06:25:39Z" title="04/12/2015 06:25  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 12, 2015</time> by noobsrtoast**

Ita a bug with older versions of KSPI and Tweakscale. Use the newest versions of both to avoid this issue. 

[KSPI](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/111159-WIP-0-90-KSP-Interstellar-Extended-0-8-12)

[Tweakscale](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/112693-0-90-TweakScale-v1-52-1%28Mar-10%29-Fix-for-PartCost-bug)
